message: I propose we split the money 90/10.  It's a fair start, and we can negotiate further if you'd like.
I think a 55/45 split is a fairer starting point, considering the value of the money will decrease in the next round.  Let's see if we can reach a deal.
I'm willing to move a bit closer to your proposal.  Let's try a 60/40 split.  If we can't reach an agreement, the value of the money will continue to decrease for both of us.
